Plot: 5 old VW's. 4 bands. 3 thousand miles. 2 weeks. 1 gloriously backwards tour. Featuring Ben Howard, The Staves, Nathaniel Rateliff and Bear's Den.
Title: Austin to Boston
Writer: James Marcus Haney (story), Ty Johnson (story), Gill Landry, Ben Lovett (story)
Actors: Bear's Den, Ben Howard, Gill Landry, Ben Lovett
